name: Virus Simulator (JoeTheItchPro)
description:
In a city where a deadly virus runs loose and no one seems to take it seriously, what could go wrong?

Now with TWO game modes!

Play as the virus!

Take control of a deadly virus and run rampant through the streets! Be careful not to waste your energy on people who are wearing face cover and keeping distance from other humans. Lucky for you, it seems there is an abundant supply of people who think they are above these safety measures and above caring for other's well-being!

Play as a human!

The health experts say you should stay away from large gatherings and wear a mask. IDIOTS! You want to go about your day! Try and complete all of your tasks before heading back home. Be careful, the virus stalks the streets looking for those who don't wear a mask. Unfortunately for you your ego keeps getting the best of you and you keep taking your mask off. Balance navigating the town and fighting to keep your mask on to complete your tasks and evade the virus!

This game is meant to parody the dangers of not wearing face cover and not social distancing (possibly related to a certain real life pandemic). While this is a silly game and shouldn't be taken too seriously, the real world consequences for not protecting yourself and others from a pandemic are serious.

This is a "pay what you want" game, so please feel free to download it for FREE! However, all extra profits made from this game will go to Direct Relief to help supply protective gear and critical care medications to health workers who are on the front lines fighting COVID-19. If you do not want to donate through this game, I encourage you to make a donation on their site: https://www.directrelief.org/emergency/coronavirus-outbreak/

This game is in Early-Access. Look forward to more updates in the future including more map features, game-play mechanics, and even a new game mode! If you encounter any bugs or display issues please send me a message and I can try and resolve it!
